author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Spear the cheese with the rosemary sprig. Place on a baking sheet and place in the oven to bake for ten minutes, or until the cheese is melted and hot inside. Meanwhile, heat a griddle pan. Add the bread and toast for 1-2 minutes on each side. Remove the toast and brush with the olive oil. To serve, place the melted cheese in the centre of a plate, surrounded by the toast pieces.
ingredients: 1 r√©blochon cheese (or other cheese in a box),  1 sprig fresh rosemary,  2 slices bread,  1 tbsp olive oil
